basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Full-Stack Engineer | Vue.js • React • Next.js • Node.js
basics.summary: Full-Stack Engineer with ~3 years' experience delivering AI-powered and automation-heavy web products for startups and agencies. Built production-ready Chrome extensions, award-winning internal tools, and scalable dashboards using Vue.js, React, TypeScript, Node.js, and Python. Known for rapid delivery, ownership, and cross-functional communication. Remote-first, fluent in English, Romanian, Russian.

work.name: BigFoot Company
work.summary: Led technical design and feature delivery for an early-stage Telegram advertising and user retargeting platform. Enabled campaign automation, multi-channel messaging, analytics, and backend support in a lean, distributed startup team.
highlights: Architected relational data models and API endpoints; designed and optimized PostgreSQL schemas for campaign tracking and analytics.
Developed dashboards and UI components (Nuxt 3, Vue 3, TypeScript) for multi-channel Telegram campaign management.
Built Telegram bot automation system for campaign broadcasting and user retargeting.
Contributed backend features using Java Spring Boot and Node.js, including statistics pipeline and workflow.
Managed remote Linux server deployments (Docker, CI/CD) for reliable uptime.
Maintained high productivity and clear team communication during frequent pivots.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Delivered full-stack, AI-driven, and automation solutions for B2B and academic clients in a small, agile team.
highlights: Independently developed AdGognition (R&D): AI-powered Chrome extension for ad image detection using CNN and OpenAI CLIP, achieving >90% accuracy.
Built RoboGPT prototype: LLM-powered robotics/automation bot, managed ML integration and orchestration.
Refactored and modernized university exam platform frontend to Vue.js with Vuetify for improved delivery and accessibility.
Led frontend engineering (Vue 2, Vuetify, Pinia), integrating with C# .NET backend.
Deployed Python/Flask servers for AI/ML PoCs and managed individual delivery/demos.
Awarded for Otis automation tool deployed internally at CGS Romania.

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided customer support and developed award-winning internal workflow automation.
highlights: Won 1st place in Innovation Contest for 'Otis', a JavaScript tool automating form-filling and email generation.
Automated repetitive workflows with JavaScript/jQuery, increasing team efficiency.

courses: Bachelor Thesis: Building a Modern Fullstack Web Application

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Won for 'Otis' automation tool that streamlined templating and email workflows.

Built AI pipeline: Python training → TFJS export → Chrome extension deployment.
Implemented Flask services, model hosting, and monitoring.

highlights: Integrated LLM command parsing and Isaac Sim control scripts.
Reduced manual simulation input by ~30%.
Co-authored technical documentation for R&D.
